name: Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Powdery Floral.Key Notes:Amber, Moroccan Jasmine, Sandalwood.Fragrance Description:A lighter way to indulge in the Cashmere Mist collection, this eau de toilette is a sublime whisper of cashmere, combining essences of amber, Moroccan jasmine, and warm sandalwood. Beautifully fresh and subtle, the scent is perfect for wearing all year long..About the Bottle:Designed by Donna Karanu2018s late husband, sculptor Stephen Weiss, the iconic Cashmere Mist Eau de Toilette bottle mirrors the beautiful contours and lines of the female form in glass.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water, Fragrance, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Linalool, Coumarin, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Farnesol, Benzyl Cinnamate, Benzyl Alcohol, Eugenol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent... Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume ever. Iu2019ve lost count of how many bottles Iu2019ve gone through and how many times Iu2019ve gifted it to friends. Itu2019s a soft, fresh, clean scent that lasts all day. Itu2019s also a very unique perfume that doesnu2019t smell similar to any other Iu2019ve tried (and Iu2019ve tried too many to count) and people are constantly asking me what fragrance Iu2019m wearing when I use this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love...love...love.  Such a fabulous, fresh and soft scent.  Always my go to!  Love the deodorant also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 35 and have been wearing this on and off since high school. I donu2019t consider this an u201cold ladyu201d scent at all (taste is subjective I suppose?). If you donu2019t care for those cloying fruity florals that every brand seems to put out, give this a try. A little goes a long way but it is warm, sexy, and comforting all at the same time. It is floral but not overwhelming or headache inducing as some jasmine/lily perfumes can be. Itu2019s blended well so that you canu2019t really pick out one note, it all works together seamlessly. I get the most compliments when I wear this. Try the deodorant too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bold, intense, strong, aggressive.  Not really too feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a love hate scent. That being said, I hate to say this but, when I was younger I didn't too much care for this scent ON ME. I somehow became the owner of a large bottle (had no idea how much it actually $$!) which sat dressers and vanitys as I grew and moved around for years until I got rid of it last year. Recently, I smelled a mag insert and it came across as softly seductive, clean, comfortable, powdery, and musky. Perfect for when you want to smell like you just naturally smell good. Anyhow, tried it again because I never HATED it...it just didn't..'work' for me. However this time is totally different! I've had it on for hours and I smell exactly like the mag insert still! Maybe my nose matured, maybe my body chemistry changed, I'm sure it has. That makes ALL the difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s beautiful and clean. It is powdery, but I actually enjoy it in this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this ... but I guess it doesnu2019t mix with my body chemistry well.  I loved the magazine sample, but I donu2019t like this on me. My search continues for a go - to scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells light. Very clean.

reviews.review_title: Didn't live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed this scent, as I consider it to be a somewhat of a modern day staple.  I sampled this product recently and did not like it at all.  It smelled very heavy on the alcohol and very cheap to me.  The only redeeming feature may have been that the scent lasted a long time - but then again, who wants to smell that cheap scent for a long time?

I've owned 30  different fragrances in my years of perfume collecting, this was one of the very first.  Out of all of them, this is the one I get the most compliments on. Especially men! My man, strangers, friends. It's the most feminine, soft, powdery, warm fragrance. A timeless classic! Every woman should own a bottle of Cashmere Mist <3
So feminine and soft, and not too strong.

reviews.review_title: This passes the test with A+
reviews.review_text: My husband does not like many perfumes but he loves when I wear this. For me, that's the best review!

I tried this on in the store the other day and here are my impressions: It started out quite spicy and musky at first spritz. My friend and I thought it smelled like cinnamon at first, though it is not one of the perfume's notes. After a few minutes the spiciness dried down to a warm powdery musk that overwhelmingly reminded me of my mother. She wears Coty Vanilla Musk and Jovan White Musk, so that's what this reminds me of, but Cashmere Mist is more powdery and less intense than either. Cashmere Mist reminds me of a cross between a creamy musk and baby powder. It is a warm, comforting scent. If I had to describe it in one word, I would say it is maternal. It is a grown up fragrance. I'd recommend it for women 25+ and think it would be lovely on a woman in her 40's and 50's. I can't really picture a woman younger than 25 wearing this. It would make a good everyday fragrance.

Dk Cashmere mist is a clean, delicate scent, yet noticeable and long lasting. The theory of  powdery old lady smell can be determined by YOUR ENTIRE STYLE THAT DAY! because if you use it with trendy elegant outfit, people will like it, and consider it part of being delicate and elegant that day! But if you ware it with boring, or cheap looking styles, YOU will trigger the idea of old lady SO if you personally like it and know what you gonna ware with, trust yourself! But I still consider it better for day time, fantasy offices, or casual evenings.

reviews.review_title: Cashmere Mist Eau De Toilette is my one and only
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing Cashmere Mist Eau De Toilette daily for decades and will never change. I prefer the soft scent of a bath spray over the Eau de Parfum. Scents can be overwhelming on women but this is light and fresh (read description). Suggest you forget the reviews about 60+ and Grandma. This is timeless and I've gotten many compliments from men since day one!

Wow! Many reviews calling this old lady for someone 60-80. Brutal. Maybe it's being applied with a heavy hand. This is a soft, clean easy to wear scent. I consider it in a classic category like Shalimar which I Also love. Light enough for the office or during the summer.
Love the smell but so many ppl asked me if my mom gave me the scent that I had to return it....it's perfect for someone 60+

There are not many fragrances that I can wear because of sensitivities I have. But Cashmere Mist is light and does not cause problems for me. Some perfumes are so heavy that I can walk by someone with them on and my eyes begin to water, my throat starts hurting, and my head starts to pound. Never happens with this scent. I think it was developed for people with sensitivities. Thank You DK for it. I can smell clean, light , and fresh all day. And I have never had anyone say anything except good things about the smell. I have worn it for at least 7 years. I also use the deodorant. Perfect.

upon spraying this I smelled like my grandma. I actually like quite a few floral perfumes people might consider to be old lady but there is no mistaking that scent here. to me it smells as if you are in a senior home where all the leather couches are covered in plastic. a very strong musk with an artificial layer. that soapy sterile smell that seems so strong you can taste it. on my clothes it smelled like sunblock and baby powder mixed with the scent of old foundation. it literally smells like my mother and grandmothers makeup drawer because they insist on keeping vintage cosmetics even though they are used up. that's the weird thing about this perfume. it gave me an odd comforting feel but at the same time I felt like I was turning 80 and getting ready to die myself. I tried liking it but it ruined my sweater and my bedroom and I'm going to need to return it. I bought this because for at least eight years I've pined after the paper samples from the catalogue. but I will never buy this musky funeral perfume again.

This is an amazing classic scent. Makes me think of New York City in the winter. It carries sophistication with it. I also can't get enough of the deodorant. Even when I'm not wearing the perfume I still wear the deodorant.
Very soft and subtly sweet scent, absolutely love it!
I was looking for a signature scent that I can use all year long. This was introduce to me by a friend. This is now my favorite.
Love Cashmere Mist by Donna Karan. This was a replacement as I used up the first bottle. It makes you feel pretty and people comment all the time, what fragrance are you wearing. That makes me smile.

i ADORE this fragrance! everytime i put it on a smile comes to my face. it has a soft powdery musky scent that i just can't put into words... when i wear it i feel very elegant, even tho i may pair it with a pair of jeans and a t-shirt lol!
This fragrance has all the elements of a light, fresh, summer scent. It is also a great gift for a teen girl.

This is my new favorite scent. Was a huge fan of Pure Poison but when they change the formular that I now hate I needed to find a new fragrance. It is light and to make it last all day I apply after dressing. I get compliments everyday with people asking me what I am wearing. Both men and women like it.

This scent is different. It's like nothing I've ever smelled before. A little definitely goes a long ways. It literally lives up to the description when it says it seduces the senses. I love lightly misting this on while still wet from a bath/shower.
Got a sample in November. And got a Gift set For Christmas So Love this scent.....is my new favourite firt time ever receiving something this expensive but worth every penny.
I love this scent, so soft and light.
I simply adore the fragrance of this perfume. It has such a soft light fragrance. My favorite go to perfume for anytime.

I have so many perfumes, chanel, dior.. many of them and this is the only bottle of perfume that i go thru. Miracle in a bottle ha! I receive so many compliments.. It goes great with the deodorant cashmere mist. I hope they never stop making this one. Another plus is that it is not as known as all the other perfumes out there, so you can smell amazing, and unique!

I finally found a petal soft huggable fragrance that I will no doubt call my new signature fragrance! I am allergic to most colognes because of the strong coming or going affect, sneezing and headaches. This fragrance was a surprising. Thanks Donna Karan!
This is good day into night...sweet...soft..musky. Love it!!

I remember the day I opened up a magazine and smelled Cashmere Mist for the first time as a 12-year old. I knew it was the fragrance for me and I've been wearing it ever since I convinced my parents to buy it for me. It's soft and warm and when I smell it on my scarves, the fragrance almost makes them feel warm to me. 18 years later and I have tired of it. People tell me when they give me a hug that I smell good or smell like me, since it just works perfectly with my body chemistry. My father is a perfumer so I grew up around fragrance and I know when something really smells good.

I adore black cashmere, so I was surprised at how horrid this scent is. Smells like old lady's talcum powder mixed with industrial bathroom sanitizer. Gave me a headache and I actually felt a little nauseated by it after wearing it awhile (and judging by other reviews I am not the only one to have a reaction like this).

Have worn this for years now as my soft enough for every day - wear to work scent. It is both floral and musky and mysterious yet subtle. The notes are amaaaaaaazing!! The only thing I would change if I could is its staying power. It does fade very quickly....and layering with other same fragrance products gets expensive.

This afternoon I found a sample of Cashmere Mist in the Oprah magazine, you know those pull apart pages? Well I rubbed my wrist on it and fell in love, so I placed an order. I have used TOVA for eeons, but she quit manufacturing it a few yrs ago and I was heart broken. I haven't found another scent I loved, until now. I'm hoping to be using it for years.

I've been wearing Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist for five years. I have no clue what cashmere against bare skin (as the description says) feels like, but I do know what a soft sweet kiss feels like...and that's what this eau de toilette reminds me of! It's light, but it lasts. Halfway through my day, I can sniff my wrist...and the heady scent is still there. It is not overwhelming...just a steady and sophisticated scent. If you've not tried it, I promise you...you will not be disappointed!
been wearing this for over a decade. I still love it!

I bought this perfume for my mother for mothers day and she loved it ! Its not easy to choose a scent for another person however this scent is so light and delicate i think its almost a win win for everyone.

I had not been able to wear perfume for 40 years due to my husbands allergies. One day we had gone shopping and we were next to the perfume counter and it was my birthday. My husband asked me if I wanted to try any of the fragrances. I was afraid to, but I tried Cashmere. He had no sneezes or red watery eyes. I now have worn it daily and love the soft smell, it makes me feel so feminine.

I first discovered this fragrance in a magazine(forgot which one) and I instantly fell in love with the smell! Then I asked for it for Chirstmas and I freaked out when I got it! I wear it ALL the time now-My main message is that you should totally buy this fragrance because it is worth the money and smells GREAT!

This is the 1st perfume I bought for myself with my 1st paycheck from my 1st job back in 1997.... not to sound cheesy but that's the truth. I've been in love with this scent since the 1st time I tried it at a counter & just like the saying.... You'll never forget your 1st. It last so long once you spray it. Sensual mist just like the Name. I've had this scent on at work as a front desk cust. svc & concierge as well as going out shopping & at nite partying away this perfume has stood the test of time for me. Went thru boyfriends, relationships, different careers, moved here to the US fm Singapore & now I'm happily married with a lovely 4yr old.... and still a loyal follower of Cashmere Mist. What a long haul but it is so soothing & comforting to have this on I even only use the deodorant in this ONLY since they came out with this. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this you should try it & start your own journey with CASHMERE MIST. =)
I get compliments wherever I go! Many scents are overwhelming - I find this soft and long lasting.
this product is quite silly.
It's a very powdery scent. If you are a citrus and spice lover like myself do't waste your money on this one.

I received this as a gift in 2006, and it immediately became my signature scent. It is a bit more costly than some fragrances, but it is worth every cent. It is long-lasting, but never overpowering. It leaves a lingering trail of powdery loveliness wafting behind you. Never before have I received so many compliments with a fragrance. Cashmere Mist will NEVER go out of style. It is the perfect fragrance, and evokes a feeling of pampered luxury, yet, at the same time, casual elegance. I cannot say enough about it. I am just so IN LOVE with Cashmere Mist! And I love that there are so many products available - such as the anti-perspirant/deodorant & more. I would like to see a hair mist available, and maybe a body mist/spritzer, for light touch-ups throughout the day. That being said, I have absolutely no complaints. I have found my scent of a lifetime in Donna Karan Cashmere Mist. It's just true love!

reviews.review_title: loved it at first, but then it gave me a headache
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume after smelling it in a magazine. I liked it at first, but after a while it gave me a horrible headache. Also, I would not recommend it for younger women. I would say it has more of a older scent to it.

I have the hardest time trying to find a scent that doesn't go bad after wearing it for a while. It must be a chemical reaction. But Cashmere Mist is a very soft, pleasing scent. I never get tired of it like I do so many other colognes. I will definately purchase this again.

You will not be sorry once you try this wonderful scent by Donna Karan. I discovered it when it was being offered as one of the 3 free samples we receive with every Sephora order. It is not an overpowering scent and it is able to carry itself well with me not just during the daytime, but into the evening as well. I have claimed it as my very own signature scent now. One of my girlfriends has decided to do the same. Well worth the money spent. It doesn't take much either. I use Cashmere Mist Toilette, Parfum, deodorant/antiperspirant (yes, it really works in this catagory, too), and the body creme and lotion. Not as pricy as one would expect. Go for it! Try it! You won't be sorry. Sephora's free, no hassle return policy has us covered, anyway. Honestly, I can't tell you how many times someone has politely approached me asking what's the name is of that wonderful perfume you are wearing? Yes I do give Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist a 5 Star rating. It well deserves it.

This was bought for me a couple of years ago as a xmas present and I wear it more than any other scent. Then my luggage was lost in a overseas trip i took, and bye bye scent. I love this scent and was more than willing to go out and buy it again. I use it at least 4 out of the 7 days of the week. I think it smells nice on anyone and it never gets old.

I love how this fragance smells! I get compliments on it everyhere I go but it is not overpoering at all which makes it ideal for everyday wear. If you are ever in doubt of what kind of fragrance to get someone this is an easy go-to. It's that good!
Love it...Always get compliments. It's light smelling & not overpowering!
I am passionate about this fragrance - it is bar none my favorite. It it light, but long lasting and just beautiful. I get tons of compliments from men and women.
I purchased this perfume and was disappointed. The smell was just too overwhelming. I will not purchase again.
The product smells great. However, I also own the deodorant which has a stronger fragrance than the actual scent. While the scent smells great it is not as long lasting as I would like.

I bought this for myself and didn't fall in love with it. I passed it on to my mother, who is a youthful 72 years old. She fell in love with it and it is now her trademark fragrance. She said when she first applies it it smells odd, but once it meshes with her skin it smells fantastic. She volunteers at a restaurant run for charity and she says she is constantly receiving compliments on how good she smells. I just bought her a new bottle for Christmas. I think it smells great on her, it just didn't work with my body chemistry, I think.

i really cannot stand this scent. it is really unique, not flowery or powdery or anything... but it is so powerful. i sprayed a little when i got it as a gift, and for the life of me i could not get rid of the smell. it instantly gives me a headache. it actually makes me nauseous every time i even get a whiff of it. i honestly cannot fathom why people like this scent. and i'm a musky person!
I first smelled this in a magazine, and tried it out in the store several times before getting a bottle. It was good enough to keep me coming back for more. I've been wearing it daily.
Most fragrances make me sneeze as I am highly allergic to many scents. This does not affect me at all, very soft and light but very feminine
I LOVE Cashmere Mist! Always get compliments, especially from men. They like that it's not too sweet or cloying.

reviews.review_title: LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS BUT NOT FOR ME
reviews.review_text: I tried Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist last year, and didn't like it. It must smell good, because I got a lot of compliments, but there was something I didn't like. It almost smelled like wet wool to me. I tried it again a couple of times over the past few weeks, and still didn't like it. It is long lasting, and perhaps too long lasting, since I don't like it. It might be the suede notes, the sandlewood, the cedarwood, or perhaps the musk, or maybe it's a combination of those. I don't like the smell of cedar closets (which protect against moths), so maybe it's the cedarwood. Because I've gotten compliments on it, and because it lasts (although longer than I'd like), it deserves four stars. However, I'm giving the bottle away because I personally don't like it even though others do.
Been wearing Cashmere Mist for years... So soft, powdery and light. Very feminine. ALWAYS get compliments on it when I wear it.
I've worn Cashmere Mist for a long time & it is my very favorite. The fragrance is so soft & sexy. I get lots of complliments on it.
When I want to smell mature (but not old), confident, and self aware, this is what I use. It smells like something a rich, powerful woman would wear.
This scent is seductive and timeless. It is soft, sensual, never overpowering, not too sweet.
MY GRANDDAUGHTER AGE 15 LOVED THIS

Received a sample of Cashmere Mist with an order....just loved the powdery/flowery fragrance. Bought a full bottle, very disappointed in the lasting abilitity of the spray. I even layer with the body lotion, still doesn't last a long time.
I love the Cashmere Mist deodorant, but this stuff smells like baby powder for old ladies. Just not my scent I guess...
This smell is beautiful in my opinion but I never get any compliments on it. That's the bummer.

I have been reading reviews for Cashmere Mist for years and finally broke down and got a bottle for myself. I have to say that despite my skepticism, I am very glad I did. The opening isn't much, just kind of light and powdery but that's usually a sign something good is on the way. Once it warms to my body chemistry it becomes really brilliant. Few scents give you the feeling of deep sensuality but this one makes me feel clean, classy, sexy and powerful all at once. For the lady who knows how to be a lady.
This is what a lady should smell like.
I was given the lotion as a sample about 6 months ago. I have been hooked on the scent every since. I do not like overpowering or flowery scents. This light and mellow spiced is perfect for me.
Gorgeous...I have been wearing this for years and nothing else anymore. What an amazing scent. It is subtle and doesn't last as long as more powerful fragrances- but layering the products helps.

I love this perfume. It's woodsy and sensual without any overpowering florals and manages to be overtly sweet and spicy without being too cloying. It reminds me of Zirh's Corduroy (which Sephora no longer carries, unfortunately), and has that sort of masculine edge while clearly remaining feminine. The vanilla and sandalwood are very noticeable to me, and the patchouli is not obvious - I know people see patchouli and think hippie, but this is so unbelievably uptown girl, in my opinion.  Also, my bottle is about 2 years old and I've barely made a dent in it. Thankfully it is one of those classic scents that is worth keeping for years and years! And it should last years and years, since a little spritz goes a very long way.

Just when you think you'll never fall in love with a fragrance again, I found Cashmere Mist. I love layering this fragrance it is never overpowering. Always in season and always feminine without being flowery.

I don't like Flowery smells or really over powering scents. This is the best I've found yet. For those of us that get a little heavy handed with the spray...the mist is wonderful...I keep the parfum roll on for later when I get out and roll JEST A LIL. VERY clean YET seductive to quote my boyfriend...and I'm 50!
I purchased this for my mom for Mother's Day. She absolutely loves it and my father appreciates it as well because it is not too overpowering!

This is my third bottle. It suits me perfectly. It is a very unique fragrance, soft, subtle, yet powerful. No matter where I am people say you smell good, what are you wearing. It also appeals to the 30-somethings, my kids always tell me how good I smell. TRY IT!
Again I have allergies to almost any fragrance I've ever tried EXCEPT this one. I love the spray it's soft, never heavy, and has a wonderful scent. I LOVE IT.

I am very picky when it comes to the fragrance I wear. Nothing floral or to 'fu-fu'! I loved this as soon as I tried it. I bought it on a whim when I really couldn't afford it. My husband LOVES it & he gets it for me every anniversary now! I feel irrestable ( to my husband ) when I wear it. Its soft & sexy and not over powering. A great choice, You can't go wrong with this one!
Delicious! Sophisticated!
Very pleasant scent that is long lasting. I usually only wear this fragrance during the spring and early summer, then I need to change it up.
I love the fresh scent of Cashmere Mist! I only wish the body powder was still available because it was something I used on a daily basis and haven't found a good replacement for.

I purchased this perfume for my mom because it reminded me of her. Its a beautiful daytime scent that is not overpowering at all. It kinda reminds me of baby powder, thats how soft and sweet it smells to me. I really like it and it does not fade very quickly either.

reviews.review_title: Second bottle in a few months!
reviews.review_text: I just LOVE this fragrance! I first smelled it in Sephora before Christmas and got some. Just a few weeks ago, I purchased ANOTHER bottle as I'm getting low on the first. I ALSO bought a small atomizer and filled it with Cashmere Mist for my purse! The atomizer is small enough to fit in even a wristlet! I take it wherever I go!

I have worn and loved this fragrance since it was born. I came from a family of Shalimar-wearers, but found I wanted something more subtle and softer. This is perfect. Only those close to you know you are wearing it, and they unfailingly say you always smell so good!
This fragrance is classy, sexy and fabulous - you will be the queen that everyone wants to follow - It is light, subtle and sensuous all at once - LOVE IT!

I am a spicey kinda gal. My favorite is Knowing by Estee Lauder, but Cashmere Mist is a very close runner up. I use this in the spring and summer. It's light, clean, and a just a bit spicey. You can't go wrong with this one!
wonderful scent, lasting......not to heavy or light, seems to be just right.....
I LOVE THIS SCENT. I HAVE BEEN HAVING A HARD TIME FINDING A PERFUME THAT I LOVE AND NOW I THINK I FINALLY DID. I ALSO BOUGHT THE DEODORANT AND LOVE IT TOO!!!

reviews.review_title: I can never be without this fragrance
reviews.review_text: I am in love with cashmere mist and use it year round. It is soft and comforting, and it makes me feel special. My boyfriend loves this scent too and I get compliments from strangers all the time. I also love how soft and feminine this fragrance is unlike a lot of others that I tried that made me ill or nauseated. I'm hooked for life and have thrown out all of my other perfumes.

Someone, in one of the reviews, described this perfume to have soapy undertones. I and most of my friends love this perfume but there were couple of girlfriend that commented on it being soapy. Therefore, I am convinced that this perfume not for everyone but I LOOOOOVE it

I recently discovered the pleasure of this fragrance and bought the EDT - now I'd love to try the other products in the line!  While my signature scent has been Burberry Brit for several years, I intend to include Cashmere Mist in my fragrance repetoire quite often now. While this scent is very different from Brit, I like that it is similar in one respect: it has a woody, musky dry-down that comes out quickly after spritzing and is not overly floral (I really dislike pure florals - they all smell overwhelming on me).  Cashmere Mist is a great everyday fragrance - on me, it smells powdery and clean, but it also has hints of musk and wood notes in there, so it's not TOO clean. It's a subtly sexy smell... the kind of fragrance people tend to want to cuddle up to!
I received a sample of this. It smelled like baby powder, sunscreen, and vanilla on me - yuck. Not buying this one!
This is my all time fav! It's light and long lasting.
a nice fragrance. I had gotten the sample and liked it so much that I purchased the full size.

This is really such a beautiful scent and it lasts nearly all day long. It might be a bit mature for my age (21) but I still like to wear it occasionally. Very soft and very feminine tones in this scent and definitely something I will wear more of in the future!

OMG..I love this! Received it as a mothers day gift and I try to resist using it everyday just because I dont want to use it all! It smells sooooo nice. It has a warm subtle vanilla smell. It stays on ALL day if applied correctly. :)

I have worn this fragrance for many years now and I love it just as much today as when I first purchased this. It is a classic fragrance; truly stands the test of time. It is delicate, alluring, soft, sensual and perfect for everyday. I love to layer this with the body lotion. This is a staple in my fragrance wardrobe. LOVE IT!!!!

I was looking for a new fragrance and found Cashmere Mist by Donna Karan and was instantly a fan! I had thought about going back to an 'old favorite' but once I sampled the Cashmere Mist, was sure it was what I wanted. I am very pleased with the cologne mist, but I will definitely want to try the parfum mist also. I like it to last a bit longer than the cologne mist. I don't like HEAVY fragrances, but I feel that perhaps the parfum might be a bit more long-lasting.

This is the most beautiful scent i have ever smelled! It is truly a seductive feminine scent , very soft & subtle. If you like a light scent that will make your man want to cuddle with you by the fire this winter then this is the one!!! very pretty soft fragrance , especially for winter.
I received this as a sample. I LOVE the smell. I prefer my perfume to be subtle but noticeable and this one is.
light delicate scent. Works well with my body chemistry.
tried this in a fragrance sampler I got my daughter last Christmas and loved it.
Love the lotion and the eau do toilette. Haven't tried the perfume and do not plan to. Eau de toilette has a clean, refreshing scent. I always get compliments.
Love it, Love it, Love it, LOVE IT!

I absoutely love this fragrance! It is light, romantic and perfect for an adult woman not wanting to smell like she is 16 years old. My husband and two young sons constantly comment on how great it smells. If the men in my life love it than I would rate this purchase a total success.

I have worn this fragrance for years and it is not too heavy to wear anywhere. I always gets compliments on the fragrance and have converted many friends - young and old - to wear it. I have tried other scents but I always come back to Cashmere Mist. LOVE IT!
I get compliments each and every time I wear this, so I'm now wearing it every day!! Seriously, one of the best I've found and I'm clearing everything else out - this one is now my signature
I love this fragrance. It's a musky scent with the vanilla and jasmine lightening the effect without coming across flowery. It has become my new favorite fragrance.

I have steered away from conventional perfume for a long time. This is my first Donna Karan purchase and I love it. Got the sample first with one of my purchases and fell in love with it. When my husband came home from work that evening, he told me I smelled wonderful. My husband never noticed my scents. As they say it is soft, sensual and utterly feminine without being cloying or flowery. It makes you feel sexy, mysterious and yet sophisticated and polished at the same time.

This perfume is fabulous. I am 28 years old and have been using this fragrance since i was 14. I've dabbled in so many others but this is my staple and I get so many compliments too. it's soft and sensual and gets better as the day goes on.
fabulous!!!!!! I LOVE IT>
not in your face but warm and comfortable.I liked the free gift too.
I love the smell of this fragrance. I would say the design of the bottle needs some work....it is quite ugly looking if you ask me!

I fell in love with this scent the instant I took smelled a sample from a fashion magazine. I couldn't wait to get it and I've never been disappointed. I use this scent as my signature daytime scent. Its my secret vice at night because I spray a little on my pillows and myself to instantly get into a mellow mood. Its intoxicating.

This is definitely a delicate, musky scent. Very appropriate for daily wear. Although I do like this cologne very much, I don't believe I will be purchasing it again. Future purchases will include my absolutely favorite scents, i.e., Philosophy's Amazing Grace and Pure Grace.

I have used this since it first came out. it's my favorite winter fragrance. has a soft, warm vanilla side that makes me feel femenine and cozy. I probably should just stick with it and save a lot of money. Because I sure have spent a lot on new fragrances I dislike.
I totally enjoy my Cashmire Mist. I also was assisted greatly at Sephora.
This scent is great! A good deal. Sephora went out of their way to insure that I received my order after the 1st delivery went missing.
I've been wearing Cashmere Mist for over a year now and have gotten so many compliments on it. It's my go to fragrance for work and for special occasions.
This perfume smells amazing. I love it. It is exactly as described.
I love my new fragrance. I found it in a add and loved the smell on the paper.Have been thinking of buying it for a while now and decided to do it for my 50th birthday. What a present.
I bought this for my mom and she absolutely loves it It is her favorite scent and it came with a great little gift set in an adorable make-up bag. Very soft scent.

This is my all-time FAV perfume! I love wearing it, it makes me feel like I'm wrapped up in a cashmere blanket, no kidding! I'm always smelling myself when I'm wearing this and it just makes me feel good. :) Whenever I'm feeling down or I need comforting, this is what I wear. It's something that just wraps itself around you and holds you tight. It just envelops you within a comforting bubble of scent. It's a glorious place to be......
I love this fragrance...and have had so many comments on how good i smell....

I love this scent. Its so easy to wear and casual. I call it my Pretty Mommy smell because my kids love it when I wear it and thats what they call me. I love all the different floral smells and the hints of sandalwood (one of my favorite notes) is just to die for. I can't emphasize enough how easy it is to wear and its just such a must have. I love DK anyways, she truly captures the woman's spirit in anything she creates.

I tell you what..I fell in love with this fragrance after receiving a sample. When I did receive a small bottle of it it wasn't the same. I think the sample that I tried was the elixir. I feel like the edt is lacking something that is in the elixir.

I tried the free sample which I received it with my online order.The fragrance is long-lasting,but the smell is too powdery - definitely not for me, But overall its feminine, fresh, sensual and not too over-powering.

Even though woodsy is not my style, I liked the smell when I sprayed it into the air so i gave it a try. It's not for me. I like the soft powdery aspect of this fragrance but it is too deep & woodsy. A bit old fashioned smelling. Its not totally offensive, just not for my floral taste.

I just found out about this fragrance and it's become one of my favorite scents. It's very soft and feminine. The scent doesn't last a real long time, but I guess I'd rather have that that being overpowering all day. I don't work out of home so I don't use fragrance everyday, but it sure does make you feel special when you wear it.
This scent is just soft, powdery, feminine, and gorgeous. I have loved it for years and it is different from all of the loud fragrances out there. Pretty, pretty, pretty.
This is my 2nd bottle of Cashmere Mist. I've fallen in love with the soft, sensual scent...not overpowering at all but lingers and just smells amazing.
I am a fan of Dolce and Gabbana Feminine and Amazing Grace, if you like them you will love Cashmere Mist. I like this better than the perfume and also use the deodorant.

in my opinion, this perfume is the epitome of a feminine fragrance. it is soft, sweet and powdery. it lasts an extremely long time too. i was surprised since it is an au de toilette. pretty pretty pretty.
I must not have been paying attention when I ordered this. I wanted the perfume that I had before. This is a lame imitation and doesn't smell the same or last at all. Waste of money.
Wonderful fresh, crisp scent that lasts all day long. Not overly powerful to the point of overwhelming the senses.
I will be asking for another bottle for my birthday, I love this scent, it makes me pleased to be a woman.

reviews.review_title: Need a rich, yet fresh, powdery scent?
reviews.review_text: Great fragrance!  Classic, fresh yet vibrant and powdery. Bought it as a gift for my mom.....she loves it.

Compliments on the smell of this fragrance everywhere I went. Some people even recognized it just from the aroma. I am definitely satisfied and will continue to purchase it. It makes me feel feminine, seductive and confident.

I just love this scent by Donna Karan. I wear this all the time... I like the fact that it is light and airy... I apply it during the day again. sometimes i spray it on before bed... this product is great!

reviews.review_title: Not as fabulous as I had hoped!
reviews.review_text: I was mesmerized by my sample, but the full size bottle does not last as long as I had hoped.

many perfumes give me an instant headache and will sometimes make me sneeze, but this is nice and soft but not so soft that you can't enjoy the scent. it's appropriate for women of most ages... i wear it (i'm 20) and so does my mom (she's 48).  bath and body works makes a comparable scent, twilight woods, which smells a little less woody and a little more berry-like. i do like twilight woods a little more than cashmere mist, but sometimes i want to smell a little more sophisticated, and that's when i wear cashmere mist.

As a high school teacher I must be very careful with the perfume that I wear. It cannot be too sexy or too strong. Cashmere Mist smells great, but is not too strong. It also does not irritate my students who have allergies.
I love this fragrance!! It has a light but obvious scent. Makes me feel beautiful!

This is a nice, pleasant and inoffensive scent. I have tried the perfume and body lotion. Although this is not one of my favorite fragrances, I do like it and wear it once in a while for a night out. The lotion is nothing incredible. It's simply a lotion with a good fragrance and is slightly oily, as well. If you're a fan of Cashmere Mist and want the scent to last even longer applying the lotion and then spraying the fragrance makes it last longer.

Outstanding fragrance. I don't like perfumes that smell like every other perfume...I like unique ones. But of course, the fragrance has to also be wonderful before I'll buy it. This meets both requirements...you cannot go wrong with this for anyone.
got this for my sister-in-law for Christmas; she loved the scent was very easy to call the 1-800 # & order & they shipped it got there in time for Christmas too!

So, I usually abhor perfumes, fragrances or scents of any kind. I find most perfumes quite noxious, but this was a freebie online, so I thought I'd try it. It smells like heaven! I'm a total convert, and will probably get the full size!
I've been using this fragrance for over 7 years already! and I love it still
not bad not great, strong, if you like an overpowering scent you will like this - i dont
Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist is like the little black dress--timeless, classic, and a must have!
I noticed in earlier posts that a few young women find it dated. But, I have also noticed a geo trend and think the fragrance is Terrific!  Stop by Sephora and see for yourself:)  Boston Babe
This was a gift for my best friend, she swears by the fantastic scent, so I got 2!

bought this treat for myself.cause it represent me as a woman soft,sexy and very sophisticated.Im a diva in my own rights so,being said this perfume was made for me.and alot of woman who want step-up there a game donna karan where ever you are lovin-it and so does my husband can't keep his nose away from me.

I have worn Cashmere Mist on and off for years. It is the one fragrance that you could purchase without a sample and feel 100% confident that you will love. It is light but long wearing, and the lotion is fabulous as well. Treat yourself to this lovely fragrance. Donna Karan really hit the jackpot with this one!
I love this fragrance - very light
I admire the style and quality of Donna Koran's fashions, but this perfume is just too sweet for me.
ordered because of a scent strip in a magazine...you're always taking a chance that way --- but in this case, I won! Very happy with my bet.

reviews.review_title: I think intimate is so appropriate
reviews.review_text: It's a soft and floral and intimate scent. It's very romantic. It's also light.
not my fav, but nice.
My mother loved it I got it for her as her Christmas gift.

reviews.review_title: SMOOTH AS SILK OR CASHMERE, AS IT WERE
reviews.review_text: I love using Cashmere Mist. It makes me feel like I'm a celebrity and I also love the way it makes me smell.
I love the smell, but it only lasted for 2 hours. (I have the eau de toilette)  The cream lasts longer.

Not much to say about this one, my mum tells me if it ain't cute keep it on mute. This is a nice scent, but in my opinion it's generic and doesn't last long. But the scnet is nice and it does attract attention.
Cashmire Mist is my favorite fragrance! It can be worn throughout the year.

I received a sample size of this perfume. The first thing I thought when I smelled it, is that it smells exactly like the 'perfume' Love's Baby Soft that I wore in the early 90's (if you aren't familiar, it's a fake baby powder scent). Now, I don't really mind that particular smell, but I think I'd rather spend $7 on Love's at Kmart if I wanted to go back there . . .
It's soft, with some musky undertones, but very soft. It doesnt jump out at you, or assault your nose. I am sensitive to perfumes, and many make me sneeze. This one does not and it smells great.

I got the sample kit and this was in it. I tried it on Thanksgiving day and as soon as I sprayed it I knew I wouldn't be wearing it again. It was too overbearing for me, however my grandmother loved it, so I gave it too her. What I gather from the other reviews is this isn't for younger ladies (unless you want to impress grandma).
You can't go wrong with this fragrance. Its like a fresh, silky veil that always makes you feel confident and feminine.
I love the smell of this. It's very clean but warm and comforting in a very classy and sophisticated way It's what I would imagine Jackie O would smell like!
This is my favorite cologne and I get at least one compliment a day wearing it. I just wish you still carried the body wash????:(

I wanted to buy this frangrance for the longest time and finally treated myself...this is a beautiful, soft scent, not over-powerring at all...I'm wearring it to the office and on the weekends - already got lots of complements ;)

I was expecting to love this, being a fan of woody and oriental smells. I was wrong. This isn't heady or interesting in the least. It smells like menopause, women on the upper east side and reeks of a 'safe' smell. Utterly boring. Give me some social deviancy instead, thank you very much.

This is a lovely soft fragrance that is great for people with allergies (never offensive, never strong). I only wish it had longer staying power as I can't smell a thing 30 minutes later. The deodorant is amazing - the scent kicks ALL DAY with it. And the lotion is also a nice way to get staying some power - could smell it in my clothes the next day.

I love this especially in the fall and winter when its cold because this fragrance has a warmth about it. If cashmere had a scent this is what it would smell like, soft and calming I highly recommend buying numerous bottles of it, I have found it a good value for such a great scen

Overall the fragrance is nice. But it is just too powdery for me. I thought that it would die down and allow some of the floral come through. But that didn't really happen with me. It is a lovely scent but just not for me.
This is my favorite by far. It's a soft, feminine smell and is sweet (but not too sweet).

I love Cashmere Mist, the first time I smelled it I was hooked! I usually only wear perfume for special occasions, or going out, but I've been wearing it for a year now, and I literally wear it everyday, I love it that much. My husband loves it, too, and I get compliments on it all the time. I am very, very selective about perfume and avoid most of them, if that tells you anything about how nice it is!
This is one of my favorite scents, it just smells cozy. I always get compliments from others when I wear this. I highly recommend

Donna Karen is my signature fragrance. My man loves it. I use the body wash in the shouwer and then get out and lotion down with the body cream not to mention the deoderant. When I get out bed, he rolls over and sleep like a baby in the scent of Donna Karen and I. LOL
I used to love this, but as i get older i just smells too strong and it's seems to be on the musky side.
I have worn this scent for 5 years and continue to love it. The Cashmere describes the soft texture of the scent and could not be better described.

This is the nicest lotion I've ever used. It isn't greasy, it absorbs easily into my skin, makes me oh so soft, and of course smells great. I was skeptical about spending $42 for a body lotion but I really love the scent so I did and I'm glad. Also you don't have to use too much of the lotion so I think the bottle will last me a while.

This is my mom's perfume and it smells heavenly on her, I love hugging her when she wears this scent. I usually get to see her at the end of long days and the scent is still very much there.  When I decided to give it a try, I hated the way it smelt just from smelling the bottle but she insisted that I try it on. It smelt much better on my skin, but I still wasn't impressed upon first smell but after it started to react with my body chemistry, I fell in love with it as well. It smells very different on us both, but very warm and musky -- the sandalwood in it is killer. If you don't overdo it, it's a very light scent that can work for day/work but it will also smell gorgeous for night.

I didn't really like this perfume, but when I smelled the body lotion, I just fell in love. The lotion is light, powdery, and soft, which I love. My favorite way to wear the lotion? As weird as this may sound to some of you, I love to put a dab in my hair. I just rub some in my palms and run my fingers through my hair.

I have worn Cashmere Mist for years and absolutely adore it. Men have stopped me to ask what it is so they can purchase it for their wives. Women seem to recognize it. It is simply delicious and light enough to be appropriate for work as well as fun.
I really love the light and soft smell of it and the smell stays with you and is not overpowering. I love it an plan to buy morer in the near future. I like the both the body cream and the parfume.
This perfume has a sexy fragrance and has staying power. It is one of my favorites. It is not overpowering.
Love, love. love this scent. It's light enough to not be overpowering but has a fabulous distinct scent. I get compliments on it all t he time!
The scent of Cashmere Mist is heavenly. When I wear it I can't stop myself from smelling it over and over. It is intoxicating. My new favorite scent!
Soft... Great for everyday. Everyone tells me how much they like it. You only need a small amount for the day. Great for all ages.
My favorite of all time and time is of the essence since I am 71 years old

This is one of my all-time favorite fragrances. I discovered it through Sephora's Fragrance Finder since I love woody perfumes and there are so few great ones made for women. Most of the others are overly-spicy oriental woods or too-girly-sweet floral ones. This is just the right mix. It starts with a hint of jasmine, lily of the valley, and vanilla, and then develops into a warm, soft, sexy sandalwood and musk base. It is light enough for everyday, but also sexy enough for evenings. It's sexy in a subtle way. The shower lotion and body cream are a bit woodier than the perfume itself, but they work well to make the fragrance last. If you like Jovan Musk, (a CLASSIC sexy perfume), you will love this!

Cashmere Mist has become my signature fragrance. It is so light and warm--never overpowering--and I constantly get compliments when I wear it. Even people who usually don't like perfumes tell me they love this one.

I totally love Cashmere Mist and wear it daily. I wear it to bed so my pillow cases smell nice. I also wear the deotorant, lotion and use the shower gel. I need pleasant scents to feel good and this meets the need!!
One of my most favorite fragrances ever! Even my boyfriend, who is not a fan of fragrances, loves when I wear this. It lasts all day! Simply put, I LOVE it!

Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist has quickly become my favorite fragrance. While I normally go for the fruity scents, what I love about this one is that it smells so fresh. I wear it and feel as if I smell like clean, for lack of a better word. I feel like I just stepped out of the shower all day long! And the matching lotion and deodorant are a perfect fit!
I love this, my absolute favorite of all the perfumes, a scent that lasts with everyone who smells it
Cashmere Mist is a nice, soft, warm vanilla scent. While it is not the longest lasting or the boldest, it is a very nice close to me fragrance. Non offensive in an office setting.
I love cashmere mist because it just smells good! When I wear it I get compliments from males and females. Everyone wants to know what is that scent I am wearing. And I love saying cashmere misssst!

I 'discovered' this fragrance last year during it's re-launch, and it has become my favorite all time cologne. it's light, floral, and delicate. it' is a perfect summer fragrance, as it's not overwhelming or heavy. It is longer lasting if you layer it with the lotion.

I love woodsy fragrances and this seemed right up my alley. The fragrance was appealing, but unfortunately, this had NO staying power on me at. all. I don't even think it lasted until I left the house.

This is a must have!!! It has a very light yet elegant smell to it. I got complements everytime time I wear it! If you are like me and suffer from headaches from strong perfumes, then be sure to get ths one!

reviews.review_title: Shockingly, I can wear the deodorant!
reviews.review_text: I can not believe I can wear the deodorant! I am allergic to fragrances!!! Hives usually appear and none with this product. My Boyfriend asked me what I was wearing.  I just said deodorant! He eyes were as big as plates.
A scent that can be worn all year round. Ive gone through bottles of this and I dont get the smae perfume twice
THIS IS THE ONLY PERFUME I WEAR NOW. I HAD BEEN SEARCHING FOR A PERFUME THAT SMELLS GOOD AND DOES NOT KILL MY HUSBAND'S SINUSES. THIS IS THE ONE. I USE THE DEODORANT ALSO. I LOVE THIS PERFUME

I really like this perfume because the scent is very light and floral and perfect for day or evening. The spray is a small mist so you get the right amount everytime and it lasts a long time for a real feminine feel and great scent.

reviews.review_title: Cashmere Mist Deodorant is the Best!
reviews.review_text: I know what you're thinking - $18 for deodorant is outrageous - but this is truly worth every penny! I live in Florida so sweating is an integral part of life and unfortunately for me, smelling less-than-fresh was common. Other deodorants I tried either didn't work or they smelled bad in their own right. I never smell bad with Cashmere Mist - on the contrary, I smell great! The fragrance is not overpowering and goes well with the perfumes I wear. I will never use another deodorant!
Soft if not applied to heavily. I use this on an occasional basis.

A sexy, seductive, yet soft fragrance for every woman of every age range to be worn all year round. A perfect compliment to a fabulous night out on the town, casual afternoon soiree, or just because, for yourself. The Lily of the Valley really stands out but dries down on a wonderfully subtle woody, clean, fresh musky note. Simply divine!
very well-rounded fragrance. I've been wearing it for years. Classic and sexy, and I wear it year round.
I love the Donna Karan Cashmere Mist! It smells and feels so great! Just like Cashmere! I would definitely recommend this product!

The strangest thing about Cashmere Mist the perfume is that when I received a bottle as a gift in 2005, I actually didn't like it that much. I was living in tropical weather at the time and much preferred straight-up florals like Gucci's Envy Me (which I still like). However, back in PA now, I read all the nice reviews about the deodorant and decided to give it a try. I was surprised! I loved it! I'm never buying any other deodorant again. This one lasts all day, even through the summer heat, and the scent is actually quite mild and almost powdery but not like any of the other typical deodorant. I can get really sweaty but the anti-prespirant on this is excellent. Plus, if layered on with the lotion and the perfume (I have both eau de toilette and elixer), you just smell overall nice. All you need is one spritz in one place or one dab of the elixer. I almost feel funny because now I feel like lifting my arms all the time just so I can smell it!
Soft & sensual are perfect words for this fragrance! Light, yet, sensual with just a hint of musk.
Will become a classic! Never too heavy or strong -- everyone will ask ,what are you wearing? Light enough for day and sensual by night.

This is the ultimate fragrance for the sophisticated woman. Unobtrusive enough for the office, yet sensual enough to make a lasting impression on those you let in close. Both men and women respond positively to the aura you emit when wearing Cashmere Mist. It's the only cashmere that is just right for summer.
The first time my mother brought this perfume home, I fell in love with it and used most of her bottle! It's definitely a classic feminine scent that is great for the chilly months.

I absolutely love this fragrance so soft but yet seductive. My only iwsh was I should have bought it online to get the free purse instead of buying it in the store no freebies...... freebies only online :)
I really liked the soft, and sensual fragrance, so lady-like in every way! Makes me feel confident no matter what the temperature is!
LOVE this perfume! it is very delicate-not overwhelming! And I can smell it on myself all day long! LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
A wonderful scent. It's a perfect scent for going out or staying in. I've gotten many compliments. The last one at the dentist.
this is the best smelling fragrance. for young and old
This deodorant is so nice. I take a step-aerobics class and even when I'm sweating like a pig I can smell the beautiful scent of Cashmere Mist :)

I have used Cashmere Mist since I discovered it a few years ago and even though Ive tried other colognes, nothing else has compared and have gone back to using it. The smell is so special, you smell as though you stepped fresh out of the shower. It is just so fresh and clean smelling. I will always use Cashmere Mist.
I love Donna Karan's Cashmere mist. The cream is nice. I wish that the cream was a little easier to go on; it is a little to firm

This is one gorgeous fragrace. It makes you feels gorgeous and sexy. It's almost as if there is an underlying mystery to this aroma! If you consider yourself to be mysterious, you'll love it. Soft and light yet the scent linger! It's just a gorgeous scent!! Try it!!
Love this fragrance, it is the first one of a few that I reach for. It is light & fresh, not heavy. And as a nurse this is important to me.

This is one of the best smelling fragrances I have ever worn - my husband loves it and buys it for me. It's not overpowering, but the fragrance lingers all day. It feels like silk on the skin. Love it, love it!

reviews.review_title: Cashmere in the pits is ANYTHING but!!
reviews.review_text: I have the hardest time staying fresh in the summer. I don't dread the bathing suits... I fear cute unlayered shirts, and light colored tank tops. Even when it's not that hot - it is like I am smuggling water balloons that have both sprung a leak, every day. The smell was awful, as well. It was the PITS, 24/7 - until now!!! While I do still have to wear an undershirt, the wetness has been cut by at least half. I am stunned every time I raise my arm and take a whiff right before my shower, THE NEXT DAY? STILL FRESH! My 8 year old son loves it too! When we read a bedtime story, he tickles me trying to snuggle as close as he can under my arm so he can smell it.. Your armpits smell really good, mom! Also, I have noticed the scent is additionally activated by heat, so, now when I sweat, I don't cringe like before... At least it means that we will alI be getting an awesome nose full of the Mist of Cashmere.... LOL I am on my second stick of it this summer :) Don't EVER change the recipie!!!!!! You have made a lifelong customer :) LOOOVE THAT CASHMERE!! THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!! (Now, how about a Gucci deo??)
Light scent, with a hint of musk. Don't let that bother you, though. It's such a subtle hint, that's it's a bit seductive... I will definitely wear it all year long!

I bought this to try out the fragrance because I wasn't sure about committing to the EDT or EDP. So far, I like it and wear it on days when I don't wear any other fragrance. It works pretty well as an anti-perspirant, but I haven't worn it on really hot days yet. Overall, it's an inexpensive way to wear this fragrance.
I recently purchased this mist after smelling a sample of it in a Vogue catalog, and I absolutely LUV IT!!! Better yet, my husband really likes the smell of this too!!!
Soft and freah. Just enough scent to catch anyones attention

I have been a loyal fan of this deodorant for 8 years. Every woman I have shared this with (from my daughter to my mother) have been converts. Beautiful fragrance, does not transfer onto clothing or damage clothing, keeps you clean,dry and fresh all day. I have extremely sensitive skin and does not cause any irritation. Love this product and can not live without!!
very nice ... warm, velvety, soft the fragrance doesn't last too long, a few hours or so.

I've been using this product for years, and now have my sisters and friends using it. Living in a warm climate...it really works great. Soft, clean vanilla-like scent...but won't clash with any lotions or fragrances that you wear. Love it, worth the $.
I love this Cashmere Mist deodorent and have worn if for a few years now. I don't wear the perfume anymore but this really works and gives just a nice light smell of the fragrance.
I love this perfume! It's beautiful, feminine, and enchanting. I always receive compliments when i wear it.
Lovely smell; works better than any OTC deoderants i've tried, but i did sweat a bit (but much less than with other products and no odor!)
I got a sample of Cashmere mist and then got the wash. I love the feeling of the scent, it is light but lasts long, and it feels like a dry, warm, soft veil of parfume. Nice for the fall and winter.

reviews.review_title: i will never use other products!!
reviews.review_text: i used to carry deodarants all the time, now after using this i don't have to!! it smells same even next day:))

I first fell in love with this scent at a cosmetic counter. I was told by the counter clerk that this scent is the #1 choice of all of her clients that are NURSES! She said her nurses told her that Donna Karan's Cashmere Mist does not interfere with any aroma allergies their patients in the hospital may have, including the doctors. WOW! I have a terrible time with allergies myself, so decided to try it! It is now my scent of choice. I LOVE it!
This is the softest, warmest scent.

I've been sampling this scent every time I've stopped into Sephora, just to make sure I like it. I've tried other fragrances while at Sephora, but I KEEP coming back to my old favorite. I FINALLY purchased this full-sized Cashmere Mist since Sephora.com had a 15% special purchase, and I just tried it out on a date, and the guy I was with commented that I smelled nice! --- which is the best compliment a gal can have! It has a soft, pleasant scent that is not flowery, which I dislike; it smells comfortable and warm, and NOT overpowering and repulsive like some heavy fragrances. It definitely is a pleasant fragrance for a guy to want to snuggle up close to you and enjoy!
I absolutely love it, smells of vanilla and baby powder, very soft and feminine. This perfume is my absolute favorite, and used with the body lotion, AWESOME!!
I enjoyed this product as a free sample, and just had to have more of it.
I've actually had people stop me and ask what fragrance I have on because it smells so good! Very light and refreshing.
This fragrance makes you feel PRETTY no matter what the mood you may be in. Even the bottle brings a smile to my face, it has a certain elegance to it.
This deoderant is great. It smells wonderful & lasts all day. A little pricey for deoderant, but it lasts about 3 months & it works better than any deoderant I have ever used.

I have tried countless aluminum free deodorants and have gotten the same result-wet feeling all day and a need to reapply every couple of hours. This deodorant WORKS and I apply ONCE a day. There is no aluminum ti....whatever on the label and I am dry all day. I found it at Sephora in a 10.00 sample and now it is my deodorant forever-or as long as it is available. Thank you so much. Kellie Shelton
I am very allergic to perfumes. Have used a popular brand for YEARS and wanted to make a change. After trying lots of fragrances, this one did it. No sneezing, not heavy. Nice, clean scent.
If you can say that a deodorant/antiperspirant can be sexy....this is it ! Very light & sensual & does what it says.
This is literally the best deodorant ever. It is a little more than i would like to spend on this kind of thing, but it is well worth the money.
This is the second bottle I have purchased. I just love this fragrance. Light and feminine. A Great summer fragrance.

I got a sample of this, attracted to the description of a woody floral, but it's got an overwhelming vanilla note, which I'm not a fan of at all. (I know it's in the list of notes but I guess I was hoping there wouldn't be as much as there is!) It's a classy scent, if a little fussy. Sophisticated, but slightly cloying.
This is a beautiful scent, fragrance is very light. I love that it smells good but doesn't over-power.
This product did not wok as promised , but smelled really grea
I love this perfum !!!! I wears it since 1998.
very light and wonderful smell. Love it!
I love this product the scent is very soft and lasts all day!

The smell is perfect! Just a little floral, but it's not at all obnoxiously flowery (which I hate) It just smells beautiful and clean. The reason why I put it as 4 stars was only because the bottle is not very pretty. I like to buy perfume not only based on scent but also on how the bottle looks (I display them on a shelf). This bottle just isn't very pretty at all, but the scent is precious!
I'm loving it...it works really good as a deodorant.

I love this perfume. For a perfume that, to me, is predominantly woody and spicy, it's remarkably soft and subtle. Very sensual, too- and oddly comforting. This one doesn't scream, it whispers- which I like. I think this would be good for people who like a very soft scent.

I love this deodarant, it never wears off, you can wear it all day long without worrying about your armpit smelling, you don't even need any perfume when you wearing this at day time, it is that good.

This lotion is hands down the finest I have ever used. It is amazing how it retexturizes my skin almost immediately! I will never use anything else again. The lush gorgeous scent is wonderful. All in all, a product that does everything it says it does and more.

Absolutely wonderful! I was going to lunch with some co-workers of mine and keep smelling hints of a soft, light, beautiful fragrance. I tried not to be obvious while I was sniffing her, but it really drew me in. I finally asked her what frangrance she was wearing and she told me Donna Karan Cashmere Mist. Once returning from lunch I jumped on line to read the reviews. I'm heading to Sephora as soon as I get off of work today.

When I first put the Donna Karan Cashmere lotion on I wasn't sure that I liked the smell, but once I allowed it to absorb into my skin I changed my mind. It has a soft, gentle, sweet smell, almost like baby powder. The texture of the lotion is super silky and creamy, and makes your skin feel ultra soft!

I LOVE this fragrance! So soft & pretty, it is light & airy but at the same time sensual & snuggly. My husband isn't especially fond of it as he prefers stronger more seductive fragrances but Cashmere Mist is the type you can wear anywhere, anytime & feel good in it. Of all the fragrances I wear, this is the one I spray on 9 times out of 10. Just a beautiful fragrance.
Awesome, I don't have to go to the store to find it and its a better price anyway. This not only puts a smile on her face but saves me time and the hassle of finding it at the store!
Love it- more of an evening perfume. A touch heavy for day time
The BEST ever! Easy to apply and has lovely cashmere mist scent. Not overpowering. And it does the job!
I absolutely love this deodorant! I can be working on a hot day and sweating pretty good and then BAM! I get a whiff of this glorious smell and my arms are still dry. What a god send, I love it!
This product is fantastic. It smells great has a great protection....you do not sweat! It lasts forever and applies superbly.

I absolutely love this anti perspirant. i initially tried it 6 years ago and I ve been hooked ever since. I also like that its subtle and I can wear it regardless of the scent of the oil.perfume/body spray that I choose to wear.(I dont wear cashmere mist parfume)
This product is wonderful; however, I did not purchase the mist; rather the deodorant. Personally, I love it and I know for a fact that my sister and and best friend do so as well.
I have used this product for years. I love it. I wouldn,t use anything else. It does the job, and smells great.
Amazing protection that lasts all day (or night) even through extreme conditions. I still smell good, even after a night of dancing.
I'm pretty happy with my purchase...kind of expensive and smells a little different than the sample, but they both smell good so I can't complain!
Absolutely love this item! It's now one of my favorite things! Smell good all the time:)j
I love this scent...and men love it too. I'm always asked for its name by both men and women.
I am a sweater and this stuff is the best I've found! Believe me, I have tried tons of different deodorants and nothing compares! And it smells great, too. Well worth the $18.
I love Cashmere Mist - I have dry skin and the elixir is a oily base - so the scent stays longer - and i also use the spray eau de toilette.

I originally tried this last year in the EDP version. It was okay, but after a while it had a strange note to it, something sharp that I didn't like. The concept of Cashmire Mist was exactly what I've always wanted. So, not wanting to give up, I tried a sample of the EDT--and that reacts MUCH better with my skin. I bought the body lotion and the toilette and it's lasting wonderful. It smells warm, but clean at the same time. It does smell a touch like Johnson's Baby Shampoo, but I think that's a good thing! I think I've found the memory scent for my girls for when they think of what perfume Mom wore. Love it!
It's a bit like baby powder for grown women, but the scent gets better as it rests on your skin.
It has the best smell and lasts so long!! I love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Great subtle yet sexy smell...my husband loves it & so do I!:-)

THIS WORKS!!! BETTER THAN ANY OTC  B-I-G-- S-I-Z-E 1.7 oz Deodorant/Anti-Perspirant GREAT $$$ VALUE!!!!  WHEN ON I SMELL S-O-O-O GOOD NOT OVER POWERING  WANT TO ALWAYS USE THIS.... WILL TELL OTHERS AND WILL BUY AGAIN
I just bought this wonderful fragrance, and I love it! I wear the mist and lotion together, and it's light enough to wear at work.
this smells great! it really does remind me of cashmere. its very fresh, warm, woodsy scent that is just phenomenal! its really great and i love wearing it.
This perfume is a little heavier than I thought but it is still really nice. I bought it on a spur of the moment, I probably wouldn't do it again though.

I'm really smitten with this lotion. A light, mature, and powdery scent goes along with the lightness of the lotion. Not too heavy or oily. The scent lingers for quite some time (at least for me), and people are always asking me for the name.
This lotion smells amazing..it's subtle but so nice. The lotion is extremely hydrating as well.
Clean smelling not too overpowering, soft.
This is a wonderful, soft scent. The body cream and deodorant complete the package. A definite splurge - and definitely worth it!
I like the scent very much. The scent is strong so does not take much. I don't like the film it leaves on your hands when you apply so much wash hands.

i love this lotion. i originally got it as a sample, but loved it so much i bought the full size. it smells great, it feels great. the only complaint is that it doesn't soak in completely - which could be because i sometimes use too much.
I ordered the Cashmere Mist after using a lotion sample. However, while the sample was soft and subtle, the tube I ordered was overly sweet. I didn't expect this.
When I first bought Cashmere Mist everyone remarked how great the scent was. I just LOVE it.

I love this product, I kind of grab a small size of the deodorant while I was waiting in line. Love the fragance, so I bought it to try it on.  After 9hours of wearing it I can still smell the light fragance, I am loving it. Next time I am in sephora, I will definetely buy a full size of the perfum.
I absolutely love this product! I received a sample with a previous order and had to order a full tube. It's a very light fragrance, but you definitely know it's on and other's notice as well...

I got the free sample of the Donna Karan Cashmere Mist body lotion and I loved the scent. I had to have it! Compared to Macy's, Sephora had the better price. I use this everyday. One squirt is enough to last you the day!
I absolutely love this fragrance. Got this as a gift and now I can't get enough of it. My husband absolutely LOVES when i wear this.

my boss got me hooked on this and now I'm obsessed. Even bought the travel size. Love it. Not too much else to say. It works and smells delish. Apparantly it has always had a cult following that I didn't know about, now I am in the cult.
Love the soft feminine fragrance. This is scented enough to not require additional fragrance.
delightful and a feeling of luxury - soft, subtle fragrence that lingers long after being applied. wearing this scene has garnered many compliments.
the best smell of body lotion ever!! but I don;t think it absorbs as well as those from Fresh though.

I chose the body lotion of this scent as a sample from Sephora. The first time I used it I was addicted! It smells warm and is very calming. I thought that it would be a scent that my grandma would like so I purchased it for her for Christmas. Although it is expensive it is definitely worth it, and there was much more lotion than I though there would be. To add to the wonderful smell, though, is the fact that it hydrates skin well, which is a huge bonus. My grandma loves it and I do to, so much that I think I will be ordering some for myself!
I bought this for my Mom for Christmas (she asked for it) I do think it smells very pretty
Love the frangrance. I've always been an Estee Lauder person and I am thriled with the Donna Karan fragrance of Cashmere Mist. Next time I will buy the perfume.
I got it for my mom. It is her favorite. I also love it for myself. It smells so soft!!!!

I dont usually give five star reviews, but this deoderant is the best I have ever tried. It goes smoothly, feels amazing, and the smell is strong enough, but not too much. I feel fresh and clean, and it lasts a really long time. I thought ten dollars was a bit much for deoderant, but i am going to live on this product! So worth the price!
In a word- Exquisite.
This is by far my favorite fragrance. Its not overpowering and I can wear it to any occasion. Its very light and smells delicious. However, it wears out extremely fast.
This is a very understated sensual scent. I apply right after I get out of the shower. My skin is soft all day and scent stays with you as well.
Very light and powdery scent. Cashmere only scents me, not the rooms I walk through.
I love this fragrance, it stays with you .
The lotion made my skin amazingly soft and scented with a fabulous scent. Loved it.
This is the only deodorant that works for me, and a little goes a long way.
I have worn Estee Lauder's Youth Dew since I was 17 & had never found anything that I like better...UNTIL NOW !! Estee has been moved to the back. Light, sensual & feminine.
This fragrance has had everyone asking me what I am wearing and how they can get it. It is classic and calming and my favorite scent to date.

This is a lovely, subdued scent. It's so clean, I can't get over it. Not that teenage floral smell or overpowering like the back of an old ladies closet! I'm not a huge fragrance fan but I have fallen in love with this, wear it everyday. Very feminine and comfortable. My favorite.

reviews.review_title: Depends on what you think of the scent...
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the lotion with one of my Sephora orders. The lotion itself was great, but the scent reminded me of my grandma's talcum powder. Nice memories, but not exactly what I want to smell like.
I'm somewhat of a 'tomboy' never really got into perfum. I smelled a sample of this and it has been my signature scent for 2 yrs. I actually start to panick when I get low.
i like this scent it a strange woody scent its nice, pleasnt
A very sexy scent especially for evenings out! Light and powdery...but very grown-up.
the smell is nauseating, black cashmere is much better. did they stop making it?

I was given a sample of this fragrance as a gift w/purchase and immediately fell in love with it. There is just something about the smell that makes it irresistible to me, and my boyfriend loves it too!
I love this fragrance!! So light and lovely.I find it hard to find one that smells good and at the same time not make my allergies go crazy.I would recommend this to everyone.

I actually first smelled Cashmere Mist in a (gasp) magazine...I rarely open the flaps to test a fragrance. I fell in love. It's a scent that carries you from day to night without missing a beat. I've received numerous compliments on the fragrance, overwhelmingly from men. Needless to say it is my daily fragrance. Thank you DK.

I was a fan of cashmere mist from the moment my aunt received one year for a gift. It has such a nice clean smell. For me it is the perfect perfume. It is not to overpowering and just smells nice all day. I would recommend this perfume to anyone!!!!
I love this product very much. the smell is very invogorating and I love to wear is. my daughter loves this perfume also it is what I always get her for christmas.
I love this fragance for winter time.

I recieved a sample of this while I was living in Japan from my host mother. I instantly fell in love. Around that time, I was using fruitier, sweeter scents like Escada: Rockin' Rio (and still do, on rotation), but this is my favorite scent of all time.  It's woody, but very very feminine and soft. It's perfect for winter, as it's the kind of scent that reminds you of cuddling up in a comfy sweater and watching the snow fall. And as a major plus, I always get compliments on it!  I recommend this fragrance one hundred percent!

Amazing! It is so soft and really does feel like you're wearing cashmere. If you have sensitive skin under your arms, or tend to get razor burn- I suggest using the deodorant. It's very effective for a deodorant and smells amazing. It protects well and seems to be very moisturizing. If you like the Cashmere mist fragrance or if you just enjoy the soft, femininity of a lightly floral/wood mix- try it! Also- does this have a hint of magnolia?

I love this perfume. I recently changed from the more summery perfume of Princess to this Cashmere perfume for the winter. I get compliments nonstop and the scent gives me an extra pick me up in the morning. I'm now officially a Cashmere girl and don't see myself buying anything else for a while!
This is an absolutely lovely fragrance. I don't normally like these types of scents, but it's so warm and soft. Gorgeous.
