I LOVE DONNA KAREN SCENTS!!! I only wish they would bring back Chaos. Cashmere mist is the perfect day scent. Never overppowering soft, feminine and fresh!!! I get compliments on this all the time. Please dont ever stop making it.

I'v been wearing Cashmere Mist since my husband suggested that we purchase new scents to wear on our honeymoon... that was 12 years ago. He had a great idea that the new fragrance would always remind us of our honeymoon. I wore Dior's Dune before switching to Cashmere Mist. I'm always getting compliments on this scent and I love how clean and fresh it is.

DK CM is definitely a lighter fragrance and doesn't overpower like some perfumes do. It's a very subtle soft smell that reminds you of fur or say - cashmere! This would be a great gift for someone you don't know or for a firts time perfume wearer.
This lotion has such a warm soft sent - like baby powder. My grandmother loves it!
Love the scent---always get complements when I wear it. Love that free shipping!
I love the scent - not too strong - but it is also an effective antiperspirant
THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT. KEEPS ME DRY AND SMELLING GOOD LOL!!
We love this cream. The fragrance is light and airy. The cream is not heavy nor greasy like so many others. This is a wonderful product !
It was great I knew what I wanted and ordered it online and in a few days it came right to my door. I would difinitly order this way again.
I absolutely adore this fragrance. It makes me feel feminine and sexy. Nothing like a good fragrance to make you feel put together. It is definitely alluring.

I have been wearing donna karen Cashmere for almost 4 yrs and i love it, it makes me feel soft and sexy when i put it on in the morning after my shower. Everyone that smells it on me always gives me a complament. I will wear cashmere for ever...:) if you havent tried it yet, what are you waiting for? its wonderful.
This has to be just about my favorite all time scent. It is pretty, soft, not too strong, just wonderful. I love it.
Excellent... super fast great Thanks

I truly love the smell of this fragrance. It's very femininity. I have been using this perfume for quite sometime now. The only problem I have is that doesn't seem to last long. Overall, I still highly recommend this product to those who loves Donna Karen's fragrance products.
I love this spray. It's light and has all of the scents I like - vanilla, jasmine, etc. I would recommend for any woman that doesn't like strong, over powering fragrances,
I LOVE this scent!! It's one of my signature scents. Light and refreshing. I have received lots of compliments when wearing.
I really like the fragrance and it was shipped in a timely manner and well packaged. I also received some samples. Thank you
smells really really great, unfortunatly, did not do it's magic on my skin. =[ well the fragrance smells like white sweater and winter.
this is my signature scent. i LOVE it and so does my husband. the only perfume i've used where strangers will stop and ask me what i'm wearing.
creisi smell is wanderfol ay my gad ay guana estar cryn bicas ay laiket

I have been using this fragrance for some years now. I often think I will find something that blows this one out of the water. Even thought I have other scents that I love, this one is the one I turn to most often. It is soft, feminine and never over powering. Lately, I have been using the Elixir, at bedtime! This is a frangrance for YOU to enjoy.
Although I like Cashmere Mist's woodsy notes, I do not like the chemical smell the lotion has.
By far the finest deodorant. Smells lovely and does not come off on your clothes. Also, lasts quite a long time!

This is very woodsy, but on me it smells a little bland when it dries down. It reminds me of dry autumn leaves, which is all right but it doesn't smell rich or soft enough to justify its name, in my opinion.
LOVE THIS, IT IS MY FAVORITE. SMELLS SO SWEET, CLEAN AND SOFT. JUST PICKED UP CASHMERE SILK TO GO ALONG WITH.
It reminds me of the softness and lightness of cashmere. It feels so cozy.
I love this scent! It is very comforting.
I enjoy this and so does my mom. It's inoffensive for work and moves smoothly into evening.
smells like baby powder..sexy baby powder..
I love this cologne! It smells great and doesn't fade off. Very sexy fragrance.

The scent is quite unique. It's light, airy, and gives you that soft fuzzy feeling that cashmere would. For some strange reason it reminds me of puppies and towels that just came out of the dryer...  Great scent.

reviews.review_title: For the Love of Cashmere Mist
reviews.review_text: I must say, this is my absolute favorite Fall and winter perfume. It's soft and Subtle yet strong and powerful enough to catch the attention of anyones sense of smell. For years I have been asked what are you wearing? what a great scent...
This is a sophisticated soft warm skin scent. Slightly dry and woody but totally feminine. I would highly recommend to anyone - especially ladies who donu2019tu2019 like heavy flowery scents.
Subtle, yet noticeable, easy to wear for any occasion - I have been using it for a year and love it. It draws compliments from men and women. Definitely recommend it!
Love, love this scent.It last all day!
This scent is great to wear anywhere. It is soft, musky, and very feminine. I get alot of compliments from guys and girls alike when I wear it.
This was my HG for 3 years. I think I just wore it way to long. Smells musty to me now. Still a nice perfume.
This fragrance is timeless it can be worn any season. Soft, sutble and has a long lasting effect. Would recommend this fragrance to anyone.
This is my favorite perfume - I just love - its good anytime of year - its really the only one I wear
My favorite fragrance, very light never bothers my allergies or anyone that I come into contact with. I get lots of compliments every time I wear it.
I really like this scent, it subtle and refreshing
My mom loves this scent... it was the perfect gift for her.
I love this fragrance. Its very rich and feminine. I only wear this during the fall and winter months because of how rich it is.
This perfume is great for everyday use because it has strong notes in it that give it a very distinctive scent, but it's still light enough to wear to the office without offending anyone's nose.
Sensual but soft without heaviness or overt sexiness. Lightweight. Not overpowering

reviews.review_title: Cashmere Mist body lotion and cream
reviews.review_text: A wonderful, luxurious scent that is fresh and soft-smelling. A great treat for all over and for layering with the eau de toillette.

reviews.review_title: Cashmere Mist deodorant by Donna Karan
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite deodorant splurge! It is powder-fresh, and lasts all day! I highly recommend it for its great baby fresh scent and it goes a long way.
A wonderful answer to summer's heat! I feel refreshed and light when I wear this fragrance!
This fragrance is overpowring and it is too sickly sweet and powdery. The scent is long lasting unforatunately for those of us who can't stand the smell of it!
This was my wedding day scent--soft and feminine. It's not overpowering. It's a scent you can wear everyday or just on a special day. It smells clean and light.

Light enough not to be obvious, but strong enough to make your point. This fragrance is one of the top 10 fragrances that every woman should have. It's soft, seductive, and smooth. And it is also a good scent to induce sleep for those insomniac nights, just spray a tad on your person or a pillow and it's sweet dreams.
super wonderful, soft, not overpowering - lucious to wear
despite what the description says - this scent is way to strong
Such a beautiful and relaxing smell. I had the deoderant first and fell in love so I bought the fragrance.
I recieved this as a gift, and I just love it. It's very soft and not at all overpowering.

Gorgeous fragrance - very soft, very warm, a tiny bit powdery (but more in the way it *feels* than the way it smells, if that makes sense - that silky, perfectly smooth feeling of powder rubbed between your fingertips, somehow translated into scent). This scent has been around for a long time, but it's gotten lots of you smell so good - what are you wearing? comments for me over the years. Sephora has this listed as a woody scent,; in spite of the wood scent components, this is NOT what most people will think of as woody. It's not masculine, it doesn't smell like wood, it's not heavy. Very modern-feminine.
I love the soft, sensual scent. It's long lastling and my boyfriend simply loves it when I wear it. Great for a romantic evening!!!
I love this parfume! Almost all my friends use the same parfume.LoL.Nothing can be better!Try it!!!

the deoderant is the best and the only one to use. wrapped aluminum makes it really cool because it's not sitting on your skin and the smell is heavenly. you also don't get stinky no matter how stressful your day is.....
I LOVE THIS FRAGRANCE. IT'S LIGHT BUT TOTALLY NOTICABLE. YOU CAN'T GO WRONG BY TRYING THIS FRAGRANCE.
I love this fragrance, this is my signature fragrance. It is so soft, but sexy, but not overpowering. It is nice any time of day any time of year. This is a true classic fragrance!!!

I have been using this wonderful fragrance for about 3 years now and everytime I wear it I get stopped and asked what is that I have on and I just say DKNY, why give out my secret :) It is light, airy and not overpowering. You know when a man asks you what it is, it's got to be working.
